title: Won a game in ranked but lost lp
body:
Won the game as nunu jungle at 42:07. 
With all three of my teams turrents still alive. 
match history shows a loss too.

replies.body:
Were you afk at any point during the game?

If you were marked as afk it will count the game as a loss regardless of the result your team receives.
No i wasn't afk . I played the whole game.

Then I'd recommend you submit a ticket to player support about the issue. They should be able to give you details as to why your game counted as a loss. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I'll say now, they can't restore the LP lost if it turns out to have been an error. As in physically can't because the system is designed that way, one to prevent abuse and two because messing with LP manually messes with future LP calculations something fierce and causes problems that would never be worth one game's LP.
